title: REAL LIFE LEAGUE OF LEGENDS

embed.description: A woman who was attacked at traffic lights in the Auckland suburb of New Lynn last night was rescued by a group of eight friends from a nearby internet cafe. - New Zealand Herald

body:
While playing League of Legends at our local internet cafe E-LoonG Net Cafe (League Of Legend's) we heard screams outside and so our premade 5 team decided to leave the cyber world and defend the real world. With our strategic experience we successfully brought a criminal to justice. FOR DEMACIA!!!! 
if you would like to donate to LIVING LEGENDS in the REAL LEAGUE OF LEGENDS kindly mystery gift skins to player: 8esTone 
ps looking for the new BARD skin. Peace and JUSTICE

replies.body: Just gonna believe a random person on the internet asking for money. Pretty sure the men who chased the offender would have jobs? Kids don't have money. I mean who the hell can't spend $10 for a bard skin that they really want?? Lmao nice claim for fame.
He should not have face checked the car
Nope shoulda shut up and not expect a fuckn penny you useless twat, thats what any normal person does cunt
